title: RISC-V from scratch 2: Hardware layouts, linker scripts, and C runtimes
excerpt: A post describing how C programs get to the main function. Devicetree layouts, linker scripts, minimal C runtimes, GDB and QEMU, basic RISC-V assembly, and other topics are reviewed along the way.
